General.Name: Averlogic Technologies
General.Description: AverLogic Technologies, Corp., a fabless semiconductor company, provides application specific memory and video processing circuits worldwide. It offers video frame and line FIFOs, video surveillance controller ICs, LCD display controller ICs, video format conversion ICs, video decoder and ADC ICs, and H.264 video streaming SOCs. The company provides H.264 video streaming, video conversion, LCD display, multiple video display, video decoding, and FIFO memory solutions. The company offers its products through a network of representatives and distributors. AverLogic Technologies, Corp. was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 43, Rui Guang Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 114
